original_title: Sri Lanka to seek BOT investor for Galle leisure port
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s cabinet of ministers had given the approval to call for expressions of interests from private investors to develop Galle Port as a leisure and commercial port as a public private partnership (PPP), Minister Bandula Gunawardana said.
The private party will have to invest on a breakwater, sea wall, deep passenger anchorage, channel and land filling.
Mixed development projects would be set up on the filled land, he said.
The PPP would be on a build operate transfer basis. (Colombo/Mar05/2024)
